summary: Dark elves in the vein of the original D&D Drow design.
descriptionHtml:
The dark elves of Morrowind are visually reimagined in the vein of the original D&D Drow design.
With skin as dark as night and hair like snow.

Most NPCs are no longer wearing facepaint, except for a few dark mages. Beards have been removed as well.



Installation
----

Place folders \"meshes\" and \"textures\" in your data folder, optionally place the \"textures\" folder from \"- Optional Dark Eyes\" in your data folder also.

Licensing/Legal
----

Do not redistribute without my permission.
author: DrowOfMorrowind
